General.Name: Hydrogene De France SA
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hydrogène de France Société anonyme develops and operates as independent power producer in France and internationally. It operates two hydrogen power plants; and manufactures and sells high power fuel cells. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Lormont, France.

0.Name: Mr. Damian  Havard
0.Title: Pres of the Board & Director Gen.
